ISSUE.TITLE: Issue with the "Create" project button
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I have installed label-studio using pip command and started playing around with Project and Tasks. I found one issue with the "Create" project button. It might be a frontend issue. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behaviour: 1. Login with a valid username and password. 2. Click on the "Create" button. It will open a popup where the user can provide project details. 3. Suppose the user presses the "Esc" button, the popup will get close. 4. Now the user again clicks the "Create" button, it does not open the popup. That must be an error. **Expected behaviour** Clicking on the "Create" button should open the popup in any case. **Environment** - OS: iOS - Python Version 3.8 - Label Studio Version 1.1 - Browser: Chrome (v92.0) https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1465530/128601457-78351a23-deee-429a-b7d4-6d099f58eaf2.mov
